bwwExcerpt: The most recent touring production of THE LION KING, now playing at The Kennedy Center until July 29th, somehow accomplishes both. The story, songs, and characters are well known, timeless, and familiar, of course. What I did not expect was that, after so many years, I would still be captivated by the exquisite puppetry, beautiful costumes, and towering scenery that are still arguably director Julie Taymor’s, and so many others, finest work.
